• Wash frequently to help

Headaches
Some	pregnant	women	find	
they get a lot of headaches.
How to ease headaches
• Try and get more regular 
rest and relaxation.
• Paracetamol in the 
recommended dose is 
generally considered safe 
for pregnant women but 
there are some painkillers 
that you should avoid. 
Speak to your pharmacist, 
nurse, midwife, health 
visitor or GP about how 
much paracetamol you can 
take and for how long.
When to get help
If
